entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Snow level 900 metres. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Snow level 900 metres. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 26 March 2023
